name: The Last Battleship
description:
You will play a battleship in the future, The Last Battleship after the recent conflict with the enemy.

The enemy fleet is making its way to the planet and you ALONE must destroy them.

Experience 7 Levels of varying difficulty in this redesigned battleship combat in space.

This is a project so any feedback is welcome.

Modifications to base:

  1. Added custom UI elements.
  2. Added custom user controls
  3. Added custom art work and audio

Credit :

Game created by myself

All content added is either Public domain or CC0.

https://foozlecc.itch.io/void-fleet-pack-1 - Spaceship graphics

https://sungraphica.itch.io/sci-fi-game-ui-collection-free-version - UI elements

https://pixabay.com/ - Sounds and music
